Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Westbound Reroute near Van Buren/Ashland
ShortDescription: Westbound 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Loomis, Adams, Ogden and Van Buren: due to, fire department activity near Van Buren/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Loomis, Adams, Ogden and Van Buren: due to, fire department activity near Van Buren/Ashland.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop- bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Merchandise Mart
ShortDescription: Loop- bound Brown Line trains are standing at Merchandise Mart due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop- bound Brown Line trains are standing at Merchandise Mart due to a door problem. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
